mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.username as customerName, t2.avatar from (select * from event_comments where event_id = (select event_id from sys_event where event_name = #{eventName} and host_id = (select id from sys_user where username = #{hostName})) order by create_time, update_time desc) t1, (select id, username from sys_user) t2 where t1.customer_id = t2.id;
